Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HE2alpha (natural AMPs; human, primates, mammals, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 41.3% similarity toCremycin-15. Mol formula: C153H241N52O40S2; Mol Wt 3525.051; GRAVY= -0.30; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide: 3.02  kcal/mol.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 17.2 uM).Synergy:antibiotics: Interestingly, the ciprofloxacin/HE2alpha or doxycycline/HE2alpha combination exhibited the best synergistic inhibition (FICI 0.26Â±0.01).
Literature Information.Author: Yenugu S, Narmadha G.2010
Literature Information.Title: The human male reproductive tract antimicrobial peptides of the HE2 family exhibit potent synergy with standard antibiotics
